amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used in contravention of section 1034 of title 10, United States Code regarding retaliation against members of the military for contacting their Members of Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 40 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used in contravention of section 1034 of title 10, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A077) Agreed to by voice vote.
